document_data.name: Fear Contagion
document_data.mainbody: '''''Fear contagion''''' was a special [[divine magic|divine]] [[abjuration]] [[quest spell]] from the [[charm sphere|charm]] and [[war sphere]]s that instilled ''[[fear]]'' within a single target that would then infect others with the same ''fear''.
document_data.Effects: All creatures within {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} of the target creature would also feel the effects of ''fear''. Any infected creature that ran away would continue to spread ''fear'' to other creatures within {{SI|30|ft|long=yes}} of themselves for the duration of the spell.
document_data.Components: This spell did not require [[spell component]]s of any kind.
document_data.History: This spell was used by [[druid]]s who served [[Moander]] during the height of ancient [[Netheril]]'s power.
